data.title: Commercial Paving Company in Lompoc, CA
data.meta_description: Get your paving project done right with Lompoc's leading commercial contractor for asphalt, striping, parking lot maintenance, and more!
data.text:
GPM knows that every project is unique. Whether you are looking for a new asphalt installation or maintenance work done to a paved area at your Lompoc business, our team knows that every project has different aspects to it.

That’s why our teams always take the extra steps that results in great service. Starting on time, staying on schedule, and finishing on time are focal points for our team.

So no matter where your business is located or its size, we want to remove the stress of working with asphalt and pavement and allow you to focus on what you love doing – working with your business!

That’s a big reason why General Pavement Management has enjoyed over 30 years of successful service to wineries, farms, and other commercial properties throughout Lompoc and the Central Coastal area.

We’d be happy to serve you, too!

We’ve all experienced the horror of hitting a pothole dead center. Potholes cause a lot of damage each year. This isn’t something you want happening on your private road or in your parking lot!

Maybe you aren’t at the pothole stage, and your asphalt is just beginning to look worn. Or perhaps you’re starting a brand new project.

Whatever your asphalt needs are, the team at General Pavement Management is here to help! We offer overlays, sectional patching, full-depth reclamation, mill and fill, and removal and replacement.

Call for your complimentary Pavement Assessment Plan today!

If you own a home or business in the Lompoc, CA area, you’re probably aware of the city’s many attractions! These include,

La Purisima Mission State Park

Outdoor Mural Gallery

Flower fields

Lompoc Valley Flower Festival (in May)

Lompoc Aquatic Center

Jamala Beach Park

Gaviota Peak Trail and Hot Springs

Point Sal Overlook

Bodger Trail

Nojoqui Falls County Park

La Purisima Mission

Temperance Cellars

JCR Vineyard

Pierdrasassi Wine & Bread

Skydive Santa Barbara

From farms to beaches to countryside, Lompoc is the perfect city to vacation in and a wonderful place to live!

The region surrounding modern Lompoc was originally home to the Chumash people. After the Spanish conquest of the area, Mission la Purisima was established in 1787. The original mission was destroyed in an earthquake in 1812 and rebuilt a few miles northeast.

Like other cities in the region, Lompoc was part of a Mexican land grant. After Americans took California, settlers began moving into the Lompoc Valley. Lompoc was incorporated in 1888 as a temperance colony.

Modern Lompoc covers approximately 11.7 square miles and is home to 44,444 people. Vandenberg Space Force Base is the city’s primary employer.

Reflecting on the beauty and experience, Lompoc offers, a local tourist website states,

“Enjoy a scenic drive along country roads lined with vineyards and wildflowers that lead to the town of Lompoc. Hop aboard the Lompoc-Surf Amtrak train for a beautiful coastal ride into town. Or fly into the Santa Maria airport, just a short 30-minute drive away from downtown Lompoc.

Take full advantage of the outdoors in this charming town, from the skies to the sea to land. Go skydiving for an unforgettable thrill experience where you’ll not only get your heart racing but also see incredible views of Santa Barbara County and the Channel Islands during the flight climb. Experienced surfers, get your thrills on Jalama’s renowned southeastern swells. And while you’re there, don’t miss your chance to grab a famous Jalama burger. As any local can tell you, there’s nothing better than feeding your appetite with a burger on the beach.”

General Pavement Management is proud to serve all of Lompoc, zip code 93436, and the surrounding areas!

Give us a call today!
